name: Heavy Cargo Truck Drive
description: This Heavy Cargo Truck Drive game is full of thrill and adventures to take heavy cargo from and deliver it to their destination. Be the Trucker like a real truck Driver and drive cargo trucks in the best truck game ever. In this wood transport truck driving game, you have a chance to act as a truck driver with the best mega modern truck. You will move this heavy duty transporter heavy truck to its target with precision and accuracy. Truck driving is not an easy job especially when it is loaded. Prove your driving skills by transporting cargo from one place to another in limited time safely. Paths are difficult to drive but you can handle it through your perfect driving skills. To drive safely on dangerous paths, decrease the speed of vehicle at turns and curves. This game is developed in best 3d environment and also has stunning graphics and  amazing sound effects. Download now and beat your free time, we bet that you will love this truck driving game.
